description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 11/08/2005

Stephanie kicks Eric, Ridge and Brooke out of her office. In Brooke’s office, Ridge tells Eric and Brooke that he is not going to stay with the company. This prompts them to scheme for ways to get the company back. Brooke is floored when she learns Stephanie has ordered to have her removed from the premises, but she begs Stephanie to leave the company alone. Brooke threatens to fight Stephanie until the end. Thorne and Darla revel in Thorne’s return to the top. Ridge and Taylor are at an impasse about Stephanie’s decisions for Forrester. Ridge surmises that with Thorne, Stephanie and Taylor running the company, they run Forrester Creations into the ground.
captions: ball in the beautiful 4670 710 for 2005
